name: AWS dev container
postStartCommand: git config --global --add safe.directory $PWD && git config --global user.name "${GITHUB_USER_NAME}" && git config --global user.email "${GITHUB_USER_EMAIL}" && git config --global url."https://${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/".insteadOf "https://github.com/" && echo "AWS CLI: $(aws --version)" && echo "EKSCTL CLI: $(eksctl version)" && echo "Helm CLI: $(helm version)" && echo "Kubectl CLI: $(kubectl version)"
